Occupation History:
Richter Weber Koch is a 53 year old Industry Leader from Germany.
At Boehringer Ingelheim GmbH, Richter Weber Koch held the position of Research Scientist from 1996 to 1998, developing essential skills in the field.
He then transitioned to Fresenius SE & Co. KGaA as a Clinical Trials Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1999 to 2000.

He worked as a CEO at Merck KGaA from 2003 to 2007, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
As a Industry Leader at Boehringer Ingelheim GmbH since 2008, he remains committed to excellence, driving progress and inspiring others through his remarkable leadership.
